intro: Psychotria pyrifolia, commonly known as the flame-leaf psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Central and South America, particularly in areas with high humidity and warm climates. The plant is characterized by its vibrant, red-orange foliage, which gives it its common name. It produces small, white to greenish flowers that are often clustered in inflorescences. Psychotria pyrifolia is often found in lowland rainforests and is sometimes used in traditional medicine.
